title: CHVRCHES Live on KEXP 2016 July 24 [fixed AV 1080p 256k]
description:
CHVRCHES Live on KEXP 2016 July 24, Fixed Audio/Video from livestream.com broadcast

In studio, stripped back versions of songs 

Setlist:
Never Ending Circles
Leave A Trace
- ~5 minute interview -
Afterglow
The Mother We Share

00:21:29

MPC thumbnails:  
http://i.imgur.com/lTm0j4Z.jpg

Info: 
Original video stream at livestream.com had several audio drops causing the video to skip/fastforward (or mute, depending on player) to catch up to the next point that audio played. I set out to fix this and ended up taking the 256k radio stream archive from kexp.org and muxed that with the video from their livestream.com broadcast.


256k radio stream ripped to WAV to trim down -> WAV to 320k AAC M4A for MP4 container (spectrogram looked almost identical) 
trimmed video in AVI Demux -> muxed audio/video to MP4 container

Video: MPEG4 Video (H264) 1920x1080 24.39fps 2281kbps
Audio: AAC 44100Hz stereo 232kbps
